title: No results when searching via Package view selection and dialog (1GLDN1X)
description: When searching via the Package view selection and dialog (1GLDN1X), no results are returned. However, searching via the context menu in the packages view works correctly.
OB: The package view initializes the Search dialog with the fully qualified name, which is not found when searching for declarations.
EB: The search functionality should first try to get the Java element and if that fails, it should display the element name instead of the fully qualified name.
SR: The search functionality should be modified to first attempt to retrieve the Java element and, if unsuccessful, display the element name instead of the fully qualified name.
